name: ArchiCAD
content:
files:
- file: https://dl.graphisoft.com/AC/22/INT/AC/ARCHICAD-22-INT-3006-1.4.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/GRAPHISOFT/ARCHICAD 22/ARCHICAD.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2005
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2008
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2012
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msls31
    description: Installing MS Line Services
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Set Windows version to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running installer
    executable: file
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
